name: places/ChIJY1nCFQn0wokRIzWNf4i2ksk
formattedAddress: 417 W 202nd St, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 417 W 202nd St, New York, NY 10034, USA

editorialSummary.text: DJs & live Latin music in a lively nightclub, with a cocktail bar, ladies' nights & a dance floor.

originalText.text: Absolutely the first & last time I will ever come here. I party in dyckman often but this has to be the worst lounge ever. There were 4 dj’s that played the exact same playlist. Each of them refused to play English music because the “owner” said not to. Had a horrible time, because I heard the same 5 songs the entire night. DJ’s sucked. Section package sucked. And I had to pay $40 each to get in. Never again & they force you a $5 fee for coat check, even if you wanna hold your coat. Ridiculous. No wonder no one comes here anymore. They deserve 0 stars.

originalText.text: A $40 entrance fee for each person (women included), only for the place to be dead all night -_- . Most of the people in there were actually workers and they looked bored out of their minds. They give you shots out of clear plastic party cups. Most of the tables were empty and we couldn’t even sit there because you have to buy a bottle to use the tables. We got hookah and had to stand around at the bar with empty tables and seats right in front of us all night. The bottle girls were some of the only people sitting at these tables on their phones bored as hell. My friends and I actually had to laugh because it was ridiculous and such a waste of time and money.

originalText.text:
Couldn’t pay me to go here again. This spot is exactly why I don’t party in the Bronx.
Charging women $60 when it’s only 1am AND doing bottles is insane. I party in the city and have never paid that to get in a club. $20 is a reasonable entry fee and that’s honestly too much here  considering the dj sucks and so does the vibe.

The ladies here were trying to have a good time but the dj was terrible so it was always short lived. Seriously he played a few songs multiple times as if there’s a shortage of club songs he could play. Hire a better dj!

The tables were so jammed and close together you could barely dance if you were at one. If you order hookah be careful. They will come around asking if you need the coal changed and won’t tell you there’s a charge to that(I’ve never had this issue at a REAL hookah lounge). Also considering we spent a lot of money on bottles here we should have gotten coal refills at least once with no fee.

We had a table and purchased 5 bottles early in the night and 5 more later on and never had enough chasers to go with it. Also barely had enough cups and hookah tips!
We were celebrating a bday so we did what we could to have a good time but what a waste of time and money.

Avoid this place if you actually care about having a good time and don’t want to pay an excessive amount of money for terrible vibes. The air your money to the city or a lounge

originalText.text: Just being a tourist spend 60 on the cover and only felt like the workers were there good music but overall a spot that I would recommend

text.text: Just being a tourist spend 60 on the cover and only felt like the workers were there good music but overall a spot that I would recommend

originalText.text: One star is too much for them. Security guard was nasty, rude, and unprofessional. They charge entrance when there was nothing special that day plus they tried to charge girls entrance when it was free. Bottles are super overpriced and the girl literally kicked us out because there was more VIP people coming in. She said that if we think we are they only one who want to drink and brought us the check when we did not ask for it. And adding more to that I felt sick and the security guard said that he was going to call the police on me so they would take me to the precinct. Horrible staff with no education is what they have here.
